freenet.support
Class TokenBucket

java.lang.Object
  freenet.support.TokenBucket

public class TokenBucket
extends Object

Token bucket. Can be used for e.g. bandwidth limiting. Tokens are added once per tick.

TokenBucket

public TokenBucket(long max,
                   long nanosPerTick,
                   long initialValue)
Create a token bucket.

Parameters:
max - The maximum size of the bucket, in tokens.
nanosPerTick - The number of nanoseconds between ticks.
Method Detail

instantGrab

public boolean instantGrab(long tokens)
Either grab a bunch of tokens, or don't. Never block.

Parameters:
tokens - The number of tokens to grab.
Returns:
True if we could acquire the tokens.

partialInstantGrab

public long partialInstantGrab(long tokens)
Try to grab some tokens; if there aren't enough, grab all of them. Never block.

Parameters:
tokens - The number of tokens to grab.
Returns:
The number of tokens grabbed.

forceGrab

public void forceGrab(long tokens)
Remove tokens, without blocking, even if it causes the balance to go negative.

Parameters:
tokens - The number of tokens to remove.
